docs.title: Home
docs.text: Teaching and research in human and computational biomechanics at Universidad de Antioquia.

docs.title: Biomechanics UdeA
docs.text:
This website hosts educational material for:

  • Human Biomechanics
  • Computational Biomechanics
  • Student research groups and gait lab projects

Laboratory guides, open-source software tutorials, OpenSim models, and anonymized datasets used for teaching and research.

docs.title: 🚀 Quick Access
docs.text:
• Biomechanics of Human Movement Overview, lab sessions and basic gait analysis tutorials.

  • Computational Biomechanics OpenSim workflows, models and simulation projects.

  • Datasets Small anonymized datasets and links to larger collections in OneDrive.

docs.title: Areas of work
docs.text:
• Gait laboratory – motion capture, basic instrumentation, and introductory analysis.
  • Modeling and simulation – musculoskeletal models and numerical experiments.
  • Design and prototyping – CAD models, STL files, and 3D-printable parts.

docs.title: Instructor
docs.text: Juliana Uribe Pérez Biomedical Engineering Program – University of Antioquia
